headline: Gregory C. Garland Named to ExxonMobil Board of Directors
summary: SPRING, Texas, October 29, 2025--Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE: XOM) announced today that Gregory C. Garland has been elected to its board of directors, effective November 3, 2025.
